channel.title: What would you do?
channel.description: Alright, I am currently 15, as most of you already know. Anyways, my sister (she is 17) is talking to this guy, and he's trying to get her to send him nude pics. I am not really the fighting type, but I told her that if she does do this, and I see him around, I will be the living fuck out of him. I have already warned him, more than once.... my dad has also tried. I already have my mom's and dad's permission to do this. I know that most of you don't think fighting solves anything, but when it comes to my family, I will do anything it takes. So, what would you all do?

item.title: What would you do?
item.dc:creator: @Svitkona Svitkona
item.description:
@Svitkona wrote:

If you try to control her life she will end up retaliating harshly. Like someone said before, it is illegal to have nude (iirc the law is against any erotic pose) pictures of her if she is under 18. Think about it like this, if your parents told you not to go out with a certain guy who you really want to go out with because he does something, would you really like it?

Read full topic

item.description:
@HcoJustin wrote:

HcoJustin:

Call the police for child pornography after you do whatever you need to do rofl

SETO:

Regarding the guy, you can talk to your local police station about this, this is a form of harassment, Assuming that he is trying to get her to do it.

Mine is better

Read full topic

just dont speak to her for two or so weeks if she does. beating up her bf may (will) get your ass kicked. women hate being ignored.

I’m taking all of this into consideration.

item.title: What would you do?
item.dc:creator: @Tree Tree
item.description:
@Tree wrote:

@Skyru: You ask for other’s opinions, yet attempt to shoot them down. I gave you excellent advice, yet you only listened to it through another individuals mouth.

You then carry on like a child. A closed minded child. Change your attitude. I guess it just could be an age thing.

item.title: What would you do?

item.description:
@T41 wrote:

[quote=“Skyru, post:70, topic:435686”]What the fuck is a homaphobe?
If you mean “Homophobe” yes, I hate fags.
Penis + Vagina = Amazing
Penis + Penis = Just kill yourself[/quote]
quite sad of you to think this way

item.title: What would you do?
item.dc:creator: @SETO SETO
item.description:
@SETO wrote:

[quote=“Skyru, post:16, topic:435686”]@Rey_ I have, but when it comes to my FAMILY I will not stand for it.
and I don’t know what they do in ‘private’ as long as I don’t know about it, i’m fine.[/quote]

i understand where you are coming from, as most of these people here have no morals at all or i am sure when they become parents they wouldn’t mind their daughter sending out picture like that.

I suggest you try to talk to her and tell her the consequences, it can be painful if she doesn’t listen to you but i guess that’s life, hope it works out for the best!

Regarding the guy, you can talk to your local police station about this, this is a form of harassment, Assuming that he is trying to get her to do it.

You are right about never wanting to get to know the guy, which decent man would ask for a women’s nude picture.
It good to know that your parents raised you like this, this generation is so self centered.

Read full topic
